EmailTemplate.subject: JetWave is Perfect for One Aircraft or Many
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://standardaero.com/]]>
Dear Customers,
Whether you own one aircraft or many, adding Honeywell’s JetWave™ in-flight connectivity upgrade to your aircraft is a sound business investment.
With several different connection options provided by Honeywell’s GoDirect™ services, owners and corporate flight departments can choose the service level that is right for their fleet or single aircraft.
What are you waiting for? Truly global in-flight connectivity is just a click away.
Schedule your upgrade with StandardAero and join the hundreds of aircraft flying with JetWave today.
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/StandardAero_JetWave.html]]>
